description: Number of labeled 3-node T_0-hypergraphs with n hyperedges (empty hyperedges and multiple hyperedges included).
comments: A hypergraph is a T_0 hypergraph if for every two distinct nodes there exists a hyperedge containing one but not the other node.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (8,-28,56,-70,56,-28,8,-1).
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Goran Kilibarda, Jan 23 2001
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Jan 24 2001
